30177.name: Fertilizers: Nitrogen Fertilizers (N total nutrients) - Production Quantity in nutrients (FAO (2017))
30177.description: The Fertilizers dataset contains information on the Production, Trade, Agriculture Use and Other Uses of chemical and mineral fertilizers products, both in total nutrients and in amounts of product, over the time series 2002-present. The fertilizer statistics data are validated in terms of summary totals of Production, Import, Export, non-Fertilizer Use and Consumption, separately for the three main plant nutrients: nitrogen (N), phosphate (P2O5), potash (K2O). Both straight and compound fertilizers are included. Detailed information on Fertilizers Methodology at: http://fenixservices.fao.org/faostat/static/documents/RF/RF_e.pdf

source.name: Fertilizers - FAO (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Primary data source: FAO Questionnaire on Fertilizers and UN COMTRADE for trade data. These official statistics may be complemented with government data sources such as yearbooks and ministerial data portals.  Data gaps may be filled with secondary sources such as country studies from other International organizations. Data are flagged according to the type of data and the source.
source.additionalInfo:
: 
SEEA Compliance. The Fertilizers dataset is compliant with the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting for Agriculture Forestry and Fisheries (SEEA AFF), because: i) its definitions are included in the SEEA AFF; ii) it follows the Central Product Classification (CPC); and iii) data can be directly used to compile the SEEA AFF Table 4.6, Physical flow account for fertilizers.
